title: r/Ispeakthelanguage Racist Jerks Don't Realize I Speak Their Language!
description: r/Ispeakthelanguage Have you been in public, heard people speaking in a foreign language, and wonder what they were talking about? Well, in today's episode, we've got people who DO speak the language, and who overhear gossip in other languages that was definitely not meant for their ears. For example, a pair of front desk workers trash talk OP, who understands every word. When OP confronts them, they practically die from embarrassment!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
